articles.title: CodeRabbit Relaunches with Enhanced Features
articles.content: CodeRabbit relaunches with improved AI models and expanded language support, strengthening its position in the automated code review market.
articles.summary: CodeRabbit relaunches with improved AI models and expanded language support, strengthening its position in the automated code review market....

articles.title: Introducing Devin, the first AI software engineer
articles.content: Devin is an AI software engineer capable of autonomously completing complex engineering tasks. It can learn technologies, build and deploy apps, find and fix bugs, and even contribute to production repositories.
articles.summary: Devin is an AI software engineer capable of autonomously completing complex engineering tasks. It can learn technologies, build and deploy apps, find and fix bugs, and even contribute to production repositories.

articles.title: Cognition Labs Unveils Devin as 'First AI Software Engineer' at $2B Valuation
articles.content: San Francisco startup Cognition Labs has unveiled Devin, pitched as the first AI software engineer capable of autonomously tackling coding tasks, achieving 13.86% on SWE-bench Verified.
articles.summary: San Francisco startup Cognition Labs has unveiled Devin, pitched as the first AI software engineer capable of autonomously tackling coding tasks, achieving 13.86% on SWE-bench Verified.
